Title: France's far right celebrates lead and seeks majority
Description: National Rally is in pole position for a historic election victory and stands at the gates of power.

Title: Analysis: France's far right now dominant political force
Description: The right-wing National Rally is projected to top the first vote - but all is still to play for.

Title: 'Bellingham goal will go down in England history'
Description: Jude Bellingham pulled Gareth Southgate's side clear of the precipice with one of the finest goals scored by anyone in an England shirt, writes Phil McNulty.

Title: Energy prices fall but relief may be temporary
Description: A new price cap from energy regulator Ofgem takes effect but bills are likely to rise again before winter.

Title: SZA’s striking set failed to set Glastonbury alight
Description: The US R&B star shone, but drew the smallest-ever audience for a headline set on the Pyramid Stage.

Title: Total of 163 families linked to funeral home inquiry
Description: Officers investigating Legacy Independent Funeral Directors are making contact with those affected.

Title: UK planning laws deter investment, says drugs giant
Description: Dave Ricks says he had considered building a factory in the UK, but chose another country instead.

Title: Taylor Swift personal items to be displayed at V&A
Description: Cowboy boots, dresses, music awards and storyboards will be included in the collection.

Title: Jay Slater's family vow to continue search
Description: The Spanish police search for Jay Slater ends, but his family and friends maintain their efforts.

Title: Caribbean braces as Hurricane Beryl strengthens
Description: Caribbean islands are preparing for the arrival of an increasingly powerful storm from Sunday night.

Title: Reform candidate defects to Tories over racism row
Description: Liam Booth-Isherwood ditches his campaign citing "reports of racism" in the party.

Title: Boeing to get 'sweetheart deal' -victims' lawyer
Description: The deal includes a fine, three years of probation and safety audits, according to a lawyer representing the victims of two fatal Boeing 737 Max crashes.

Title: 'French right humiliates Macron' and 'Saved by the Bell'

Title: 'When Shania Twain asks you to go on tour, you go'

Title: More wounded Palestinians tell BBC the Israeli army forced them on to jeep
Description: Two more Palestinian men tell the BBC they were shot and forced on to the bonnet of an Israeli jeep.

Title: I recognised my sister in video of refugees captured in Sudan war
Description: Eritreans tell the BBC their relatives are being detained incommunicado by Sudan's military.

Title: Allies defend Biden as poll suggests growing age concern
Description: According to the poll, 72% of registered voters believe Mr Biden is not mentally fit enough to serve as president.

Title: Avril Lavigne on waiting 22 years to play Glastonbury
Description: The 39-year-old Canadian singer performed at the festival as part of her greatest hits tour.

Title: Bellingham rescues England with injury-time overhead kick
Description: Watch as Jude Bellingham scores a stunning injury-time goal to send England in to extra time against Slovakia in the Euro 2024 last-16 match at Gelsenkirchen.

Title: Watch: England goal stuns reporter during live interview
Description: Jude Bellingham scored a winning goal against Slovakia, with an airborne kick that shocked the audience.

Description: BBC Sport takes a look at England's possible routes through the Euro 2024 knockout stage.

Title: We would do anything to protect this manager - Rice
Description: Midfielder Declan Rice says England's players would "do anything to protect" under-fire manager Gareth Southgate after they booked a last-eight meeting with Switzerland in dramatic fashion.

Title: 'Deepfake' Southgate videos viewed by millions
Description: The Football Association criticises AI-generated videos on social media purporting to show Gareth Southgate making crude remarks about England players.

Title: PM insists UK better place to live now than in 2010
Description: The PM says Coivd and the Ukraine war made things "difficult" but the UK was "on the right track".

Title: What election issues really matter to you? Let us know

Description: SNP leader John Swinney says a UK-wide approach will not address Scotland's skills shortages.

Title: Sir John Curtice: Tories still behind Labour... in 60 seconds
Description: With four days to go until election day, the Tories are still behind Labour by 20 points.

Title: Could Labour 'stop the boats'?
Description: Labour wouldn’t send asylum seekers to Rwanda, but can their alternative plan hope to stop the boats?

Title: Has frantic election campaign actually grappled with massive issues UK faces?

Title: Is this really the TikTok general election?

Title: Arctic 'dirty fuel' ban for ships comes into force

Title: South Africa's new coalition government unveiled

Title: Charge over alleged inmate and officer sex video
Description: The Met Police said it began an investigation "after officers were made aware of a video".

Title: Suspected female suicide bombers kill at least 18 in Nigeria
Description: A wedding, the funeral of those killed there as well as a hospital were targeted in a series of attacks.

Title: Russell wins Austrian GP after late Norris-Verstappen collision

Title: Ex-Olympian among first-time election candidates
